name: Pin (bean borg)
description:
You play as Pin, a large and chonky bird. Your goal is to find enough twigs, by ramming into trees or by accomplishing percarious feats, to build a nest for you and your girlfriend for the winter! There is an issue, you are too large to fly! Luckily enough, your chonk allows you to roll to get around quickly!

Winner of Charger Studio's 4th Shanty Jam!

Controls (Joystick Recommended)

Roll: Left stick or WASD

Camera: Right stick or arrows or mouse

Chirp: X, Y, B buttons or Q, E keys

Jump: A button or mouse button or space bar (You can hold!)

(You can flap in the air to get height, but you cannot lift yourself up off the ground without the help of momentum)

Credits
